mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company(company_id, company_name, company_detail, company_tel, company_person, company_address,lat_company ,lng_company ,company_pic ,is_check , emp_id, provinceid, cityid, areaid, dateline ) VALUES (#{company_id}, #{company_name}, #{company_detail}, #{company_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company_person,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{lat_company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng_company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company_pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_check,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateline,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT lc.*,le.emp_name as emp_name, le.emp_cover as emp_cover,le.emp_mobile as emp_mobile,lp.pname as pname,lcity.cityName as cityName,larea.areaName as areaName from company lc LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON le.emp_id = lc.emp_id LEFT JOIN province lp ON lp.provinceid = lc.provinceid LEFT JOIN city lcity ON lcity.cityid = lc.cityid LEFT JOIN area larea ON larea.areaid = lc.areaid where lc.company_id=#{company_id}

SELECT lc.*,le.emp_name as emp_name, le.emp_cover as emp_cover,le.emp_mobile as emp_mobile,lp.pname as pname,lcity.cityName as cityName,larea.areaName as areaName from company lc LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON le.emp_id = lc.emp_id LEFT JOIN province lp ON lp.provinceid = lc.provinceid LEFT JOIN city lcity ON lcity.cityid = lc.cityid LEFT JOIN area larea ON larea.areaid = lc.areaid where lc.emp_id=#{emp_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE company SET company_name=#{company_name}, company_detail=#{company_detail} , company_tel=#{company_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_person=#{company_person,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_address=#{company_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provinceid=#{provinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cityid=#{cityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, areaid=#{areaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE company_id=#{company_id}
UPDATE company SET is_check=#{is_check} WHERE company_id=#{company_id}
UPDATE company SET company_pic=#{company_pic} WHERE company_id=#{company_id}
